title: is garen as easy to ply as people say
body: i dont think so n is he the most op tank

replies.body:
Do you know how to run towards an enemy? Do you know how to run away from an enemy? 

yes? yes?

Congrats you have mastered all possible Garen manouvers!

no im asking if hes the most op tank

"Is garen as easy to play as people say?"
"i dont think so"
"heck yh hes broken yo"
"nah he takes some skill"

^ Those are the only words you have written on this post, where anywhere in there does it ask anything about him being OP or anything to do with a tank?

why ask "is garen easy" if your actual question is "is he the most op tank"? that doesn't make any sense, they are different questions.

you asked if he is easy, i answered.


is he the the most OP tank? that determines what you are judging "tank" on. if you are only talking about the ability to soak up damage, then no. Probably naught or rammus or maybe shen would be the best at that.

but if you are talking about being tanky while dealing lots of damage, then yea he probably is one of the better champs at dealing lots of damage while being hard to kill, Like Shyv, Cho or Singed.

I dont have a problem, first you are unable to explain what it is you are asking and then after i answer not only the question you asked, but also the question you wanted to ask, you still aren't happy. It seems you are the one who is problematic.

plus i know what your name is and aim to avoid the 'rage' part.
He takes no skill whatsoever to do well with but he's very linear and predictable. Because his kit is painfully simple its very easy to know exactly what he's going to do and when.
Just a low skill cap champ that a lot of people know how to play against
